text: (mujhe maaph keejie) mai to abhee kisee pahaad ka sahaara pakadata hoon jo mujhe paanee (mein doobane) se bacha lega nooh ne (usase) kaha (are kambakht) aaj khuda ke azaab se koee bachaane vaala nahin magar khuda hee jis par raham pharamaega aur (ye baat ho rahee thee ki) yakaayak dono baap bete ke daramiyaan ek mauj hael ho gaee aur vah doob kar rah gaya
